name: Plantarium (Jafar Dakhan)
description:
small game made for the Cultivation jam 2022.

______________________________________________________

🌱10 Plants.

📙 46 items to collect.

______________ 

🎮 Controls:

- WASD or Arrows: move,  jump

- Space: jump

- F: interact

- Tab: open and close inventory

- S: plant\water\harvest

- Left click: place decoration

- Right click: grab decoration

Yes,  that's a lot..

____________________________________________

🔧Credits:

- Programming, art, and design: me

- Font: monogram by vmenezio

- Some sounds from: bigsoundbank

- Inspires too much stuff from Pengu never left
